summary: An ordinance amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 12205, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the designation of depositories of funds belonging to the City of Seattle, prescribing the amount of bonds to be give and the rate of interest to be paid by such depositories to the City on daily balances, and relieving the city treasurer from liability by reason thereof" approved March 22, 1905, as amended by Ordinance No. 23509, approved March 10, 1910.
